komplet_1.stojalo: Stand with a shelf in front

stik.title: Direct Contact
stik.text: Allows you to interact directly with your customers. This strengthens trust and relationships with potential buyers.

prepoznavnost.title: Increased Visibility
prepoznavnost.text: A creatively designed stand attracts attention and can become a recognizable point at events.

prihranek.title: Cost Savings
prihranek.text: By renting our stand, you save money and can use professional equipment only when needed.

predstavitev.title: New Product Presentation
predstavitev.text: Renting a stand creates a great space for showcasing your new products or services, directly boosting sales.

marketing.title: Effective Marketing and Advertising
marketing.text: Allows for creative approaches that support your brand message and increase visibility.

dogodki.title: Ideal for Events
dogodki.text: Participation in fairs and other events with a professional stand increases attention and attractiveness of your brand.

najem.pripada: Personalized stand with logo • Promotional canvas • Transport and assembly
najem.dodatna_ponudba: Transport and assembly of the stand to the desired location in Slovenia • Illuminated logo • Stand wrapping in desired color • Long-term rental • Production of other promotional materials.
